section.name: How [[NAME]] applications are built
section.h3: A closer look at the Expenses Processing demo application
section.p: If you haven't already done so, run the online demo of our simple Expenses Processing application.

The full source code of this application is included with the [[NAME]] download, and there is a section of the [[NAME]] Application Development Manual (also included), which looks in detail at how that application is written. section.h3: Building a simple application from scratch
section.p: Follow the steps in this screen movie to create your first simple [[NAME]] application within just a few minutes. (The movie shows the application being developed within Eclipse, but the same principles apply for any development environment).
